title: Mini-Ep 220: Kat + Car + Nor
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 220: Kat + Car + Nor
itunes:subtitle: When Doree’s away, Caroline Moss and Nora McInerny come out to play! Kate invites guest hosts on the pod while Doree’s on vacation to answer listener questions about black-tie weddings, when to move out of your parents' house, and how to tell your...
description:
When Doree’s away, Caroline Moss and Nora McInerny come out to play! Kate invites guest hosts on the pod while Doree’s on vacation to answer listener questions about black-tie weddings, when to move out of your parents' house, and how to tell your family you don’t want to be a part of old traditions.


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.
  • Follow us on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter


This episode is sponsored by:
